div.bibl: Scandia, Oct. 12, 1901. THE NORWEGIAN NATIONAL LEAGUE

body.p: The quarterly meeting of the Norwegian National League was held last Monday. Sixteen delegates were present. The Seventeenth of May committee reported an income of $600.30, expenses of $370.30, and a profit of $230. This profit will be paid to the Leif Ericson Monument Society.
Dr. Carl Sandberg proposed that a committee be set up to work on the much discussed issue of making the League a broad national organization.
